group_1.narration: The Guardians of Time sisters@were a force to be reckoned with...
But they were no match for@the Mightiest Girl, Tsuruno.

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][se:4051_landing_throw]Yahhh!

group_1.textLeft: Damn it, I can't get up!

group_1.textRight: Yes, I win!
Now you Guardians gotta tell me.
Where's the monster who devours time?!

group_1.textLeft: How the hell should we know?

group_1.textCenter: We just help take care of the clock tower.

group_1.textRight: [chara:110300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]A-are you serious?
That's why you're the Guardians of Time?!
But... You said you'd help me if I beat you!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, we said that because it sounded fun.
We figured it wouldn't be bad to go on a@journey with ya.

group_1.textRight: I thought you were just going to help me@by sharing some words of wisdom...

group_1.narration: And so, our hero was joined@by two helpful friends.
But they still had no idea where the@Invisible Monster could be lurking.

group_1.textRight: We've searched the entire kingdom.
Where could this monster who devours time@be?

group_1.textLeft: Hey, about that monster.
Maybe it's not in the Smiley Kingdom?

group_1.textCenter: Oh, [chara:100400:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:100400:lipSynch_1]you may be right about that...

group_1.textRight: Yeah?
Then let's go explore outside the kingdom!

group_1.narration: Thus, Tsuruno and her party@embarked on another journey.

group_1.textRight: What's going on?
It seems like we can't leave the Smiley@Kingdom.

group_1.textCenter: I don't think we've ever left this kingdom@before, have we?

group_1.textRight: [chara:110300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Hey, you're right!
Maybe the plot twist is that nothing exists@outside of the kingdom?

group_1.textCenter: If that's true, then...[chara:100400:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:100400:lipSynch_1]where could the@Invisible Monster be?

group_1.textLeft: Urgh... I'm so confused...
Plus, I'm gettin' pretty sick of walkin'@so much.

group_1.textRight: I'm usually relaxing, so I'm getting pretty@tired, too.
So, yeah... We should rest here!

group_1.narration: While the three were resting,@the Invisible Monster devoured@all of the current time remaining...
And then it began to devour [textRed:time@from the past], as well!
As a result, time began to move backward.
The Smiley Kingdom was@left with just one Ferris wheel.@It had returned to its original state.
Will our heroes be able to@save the Smiley Kingdom?

group_1.textRight: Oh, is something wrong?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?
Uh, well...
I made this puppet show for kids.

group_1.textRight: A puppet show?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
We sometimes have customers who come with@children to our restaurant.
I thought I could show them this to keep@them busy while they wait for their food!

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see. That sounds fun!
What kind of story is it?

group_1.textLeft: Um, it's not very good...

group_1.textRight: Hmm.
It could use a bit of polish♪

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Yeah, I thought so too.
It doesn't even have an ending.

group_1.textRight: Are these the drawings you'll use for@your puppet show?

group_1.textLeft: Yep, yep. What do you think of my art?

group_1.textRight: Oh, it's adorable! This must be Tsuruno,@the heroine!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]No, no. That's Felicia!

group_1.textRight: Oops, sorry! [chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]Then is this one Sana?

group_1.textLeft: That's Felicia...

group_1.textRight: B-but the beginning of the story was really@interesting!
It certainly got me excited♪

group_1.textLeft: I got everyone's help for that part back at@Mikazuki Villa.

group_1.textRight: So you all thought of it together... How@wonderful♪
Would it be all right if I held onto this@for a while?

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Why?

group_1.textRight: Writing a story sounds like a lot of fun.
I want to be a part of it, too♪

group_1.textLeft: Really? I could use the help!
But, [chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]you think you can continue the story@from where it left off?

group_1.textRight: Leave it to the Coordinator!
